name: Lunartik Mini Teas S1 - Case of 20
description:
Mini Series One, Twelve Fresh Flavours & Four Special Brews! 
These adorable Mini Teas stand only 2” tall, they come blind boxed for extra freshness. 
They are so cute that… One Cup is Never Enough!

Display Packs Contain:
20 Mini Teas - A full set of 12 flavours + some doubles to swap and share.
1 or 2 Special Brews hidden inside! Will you find Mr Tea?
20 Tea tokens to send off to claim your free Tea's
1 Display tray of course, all freshly wrapped up!

Each Single Tea Pack Contains:
1 Single Mini Tea - (you do have a chance of getting a Special Brew!)
1 Doyley Display sticker
1 Mini heart sticker which you can stick onto the front of your cup!
1 Tea Bag Booklet + Tea Token

Flavours Include:
White Tea - White
Earl Grey - Grey
Rosie Lee - Pink
Green Tea - Green
Orange Tea - Orange
Lemon Tea - Yellow
Berry Tea - Purple
Rooibos Tea - Red
Black Tea - Black with cherry red eyes
Oolong - Royal Blue with gold eyes
Mint - Minty with silver eyes
Cinnamon - Brown with orange eyes

The Special Brews Include:
Hidden inside the Blind Boxes are Special Brews. There are 4 Specials to find...

Mr Tea - Strong & Black - Only 250 pcs worldwide
Lady Grey - The mistress of the Earl
Lunar Tea - Glow in the DarK
Q-Tea - The homage Cuppa.
These are all Limited Edition Teas!
